title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Blended Learning-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental mathematical concepts at the high school level
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can solve practical problems with 80% accuracy using mathematical modeling skills in a blended learning environment.
Learners collaboratively solve complex mathematical problems three or more times by interacting with peer learners via online collaboration tools.
Learners independently review and apply mathematical concepts at least once a week using interactive content provided on mobile devices.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
